name: Release Theme
on:
  push:
    tags: ['v*']
jobs:
  build-zip:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Build theme zip
        run: |
          cd theme
          zip -r ../rocket-theme-${GITHUB_REF_NAME}.zip .
      - name: Create GitHub Release
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
        with:
          files: rocket-theme-${{ github.ref_name }}.zip
